content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61) and (-18, -53)
Two parallel mining setups consisting of:
- Burner mining drills at (-28, -61) and (-18, -53)
- Wooden chests collecting ore at (-27.5, -59.5) and (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserters moving ore to furnaces
- Stone furnaces at (-25, -59) and (-15, -51) smelting iron ore
- Output chests storing iron plates at (-22.5, -58.5) and (-12.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41, -82)
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) collecting coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5) moving coal

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks (systems 10901, 10903)
- Electric network powering various machines

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5) holding iron gear wheels
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5) feeding materials
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport
- Stone furnace at (14, 14) for additional smelting

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Ensure target chest contains the requested item before attempting extraction
- Verify chest locations and contents before extraction operations

### Fuel Management Issues
- Keep track of fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure sufficient coal is available before attempting to fuel machines
- Maintain fuel reserves for critical infrastructure (boilers, mining drills)

### Research Related Errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it
- Verify research prerequisites are met before starting new research

### Production Line Issues
- Monitor ingredient shortages in assembling machines
- Ensure consistent supply of all required materials (copper plates, iron gear wheels)
- Maintain proper material flow through the production chain

### Power System Management
- Keep boilers fueled to maintain consistent power generation
- Monitor steam and water levels in the power generation system
